title: FOX Weather app on iPhone gets all-new redesign for spring
content:
Ready to ditch your cabin fever? The FOX Weather app has released a brand new refresh for spring. The popular iOS weather app brings 24/7 coverage to users across the U.S – this update brings new features and improves some of the existing ones, too. 

more…

The post FOX Weather app on iPhone gets all-new redesign for spring appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Ready to ditch your cabin fever? The FOX Weather app has released a brand new refresh for spring on iOS devices.
